com.codisimus.plugins.codsperms

Interface PermissionStorageHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DBHandler, FlatFileHandler

    public interface PermissionStorageHandler
    A PermissionStorageHandler handles the storage of permission nodes for each Player The PermissionStorageHandler defines how permissions are saved and loaded
